nodes.text: Nitram was a male Bothan and a member of the Rebel Alliance who served alongside Juno Eclipse on the Salvation during the first year of the Galactic Civil War. He acted as Eclipse's second-in-command during a brief battle over Cato Neimoidia. He was killed onboard the Salvation by Terror Troopers led by Boba Fett during the Battle near the Itani Nebula.
